::KitKat::

She took a seat next to Aracnia. "I want you to know that, in light 
of recent events, I have asked Megatron to join our Predacon council."

DarkMouse:
She turned the corner and saw Hell Beast.  She just stared at him. 
She drew her gun and looked at him. "I got the message that you ar to 
leave here. IF you wish, I"ll guide you out."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Aracnia ented and followed Kitkat. She pointed for her 
companions to go 
> and wait in another section of the ship. Taking a seat she 
said, "Kitkat, 
> anything I should know?"
> 
>     Hell Beast was at the entrance to the bridge. It was ealed. And 
it was a 
> dead end....he was trapped. "Damn it! Megatron, where are you?!!"
